title: We make it easy to get work done! Business Center Onsite
posting_body: ['-- East Perimeter Pointe Apartments --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1500', 'Apartment:', '2 Bedroom | 2 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '1186 - 1307 sq ft', 'Get ready for a refreshing new take on apartment living, at East Perimeter Pointe.', 'These newly renovated apartments in Decatur, GA offer the pinnacle of comfort, convenience, and style, with spacious and streamlined 1- and 2-bedroom floor plans, top-notch amenities and a wonderful location just 20 minutes east of downtown Atlanta along I-20.', 'Each of our dynamic and inviting apartment homes is smartly appointed with upgraded lighting packages, sunrooms, and custom paint tones, all of which work together to create a homey and inspiring environment.', 'Our amenities list is the envy of Decatur, featuring both indoor and outdoor pools, lighted tennis courts, and a cardio and fitness center, among many other enticing attractions.', 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '➢ Accepts Electronic Payments', '➢ BBQ Area', '➢
